query:
SELECT 
                COUNT(*) as total_submissions,
                COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'new' THEN 1 END) as new_submissions,
                COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'replied' THEN 1 END) as replied_submissions,
                COUNT(CASE WHEN is_spam = true THEN 1 END) as spam_submissions,
                COUNT(CASE WHEN created_at >= date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE) THEN 1 END) as submissions_this_month
            FROM contact_submissions
